title: Speaker

adjectives: Characterized by or producing sound of great volume or intensity
To transmissions of messages or signals via radio waves or electronic means
Sent to more than one recipient. In communications and on networks, a broadcast message is one distributed to all stations.
verbs: Cause to be quiet or not talk
To become quiet; to cease making sounds.
To cause to be quiet or not talk.
To perceive sounds through the ear.
To perceive sound with the ear, without necessarily paying attention to it.
Broadcast over the airwaves, as in radio or television
To transmit a message or signal via radio waves or electronic means
To send data over the airwaves, as in radio or television.
To send out a signal (as opposed to receive).
To broadcast, as with a television show.
To transmit a message or signal via radio waves or electronic means.
nouns: An electromechanical device which produces sound
Device which transforms electrical signals into acoustical signals.
Transducer that converts electrical energy into sound energy
A loudspeaker is an electroacoustic transducer; a device which converts an electrical audio signal into a corresponding sound.
Electro-acoustic transducer that converts electrical signals into sounds loud enough to be heard at a distance
An electromechanical transducer that converts an electrical signal into audible sound.
Loudspeaker.
A transmission of a radio or television programme aired to be received by anyone with a receiver.
A method by which a client receives a stream. During a broadcast connection, clients cannot control the stream. This is the opposite of an on-demand presentation.
A transmission of a radio or television programme.
A radio or TV transmission on air.
Message that is transmitted by radio or television
The absence of sound
The lack of any sound.
The absence of sound; quietness.
A relative or total lack of sound
Lack of audible sound or presence of sounds of very low intensity
The complete lack of sound or noise.
Silence is the lack of audible sound or presence of sounds of very low intensity.
Lack of any sound.

description: A speaker cone displayed without any sound waves.
apple_vendor_description: This speaker emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a minimalist, sleek design, featuring a finely textured grille and a subtle glossy finish that reflects realistic lighting. The sound waves emanating from it are rendered with soft, diffused lines, indicating a gentle, low volume. Its clean, rounded edges and understated elegance are hallmarks of Apple's aesthetic, making it ideal for subtly adjusting audio settings or indicating a quiet ambiance in messages.
